actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-11.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 692, a bill to amend the Small Business Act and the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to increase loan authorization and surety bond guarantee authority; and to improve the disaster assistance, certificate of competency, and small business set-aside programs.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 692 (Small business assistance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 692, a bill to amend the Small Business Act and the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to increase loan authorization and surety bond guarantee authority; and to improve the disaster assistance, certificate of competency, and small business set-aside programs.
